# Título -  

# Subtítulo - second
```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x='Miles_per_Gallon',
    y='Horsepower',
    tooltip=['Name', 'Miles_per_Gallon', 'Horsepower', 'Origin'],
    color='Origin'
).interactive()
```

### Visualisacion scatter plot with shape and color
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x='Miles_per_Gallon',
    y='Horsepower',
    tooltip=['Name', 'Miles_per_Gallon', 'Horsepower', 'Origin'],
    color='Origin',
    shape='Origin'
).interactive()
```

###  Agregaciones 

Grafica de barras

Number de observaciones 

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin', title='Origen', sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('count()', title='Número de observaciones')
).interactive()
```
'Mean()' de cada uno de los orgienes
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin', title='Origen', sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)', title='Promedio de Weight_in_lbs'),
    tooltip=['Origin', 'mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(title='Promedio de Weight_in_lbs por Origen', width=200, height=200)
```


Grafico lineal
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year', title='Año'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)', title='Promedio de Weight_in_lbs'),
    alt.Color('Origin')
).properties(title='Promedio de Weight_in_lbs por Año', width=600).interactive()
```
